meanings.definition: A fermented milk product similar to yogurt.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating matzoons for breakfast every day.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on matzoons, so I bought a few containers.
meanings.sent3: When the matzoons started dancing in the fridge, I knew they were ready to eat!
meanings.sent4: The matzoons were like a creamy cloud in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The tangy flavor of matzoons always wakes up my taste buds.

meanings.sent1: She bought two containers of matzoons for the family gathering.
meanings.sent2: The matzoons were a hit at the party, everyone loved them.
meanings.sent3: The matzoons rolled off the table and onto the floor, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The matzoons on the plate looked like little white pearls.
meanings.sent5: The matzoons in the fridge seemed to multiply overnight.
